paragraph.heading: 1Code Generation Page
paragraph.paragraph: This page allows you to modify settings which control how the Eiffel code is generated by the wizard.
paragraph.heading: 2Settings
3Attributes as locals
paragraph.paragraph: Should attribute declarations be local to initialization feature, or attributes of the class?
paragraph.heading: 3Debugging Information
paragraph.paragraph: If selected, then for every feature connected to an event, code will be generated which outputs to the console, the name of the feature, and the values of all arguments.
paragraph.heading: 3Client of window
paragraph.paragraph: If selected, then the generated window will be a client of EV_TITLED_WINDOW, otherwise it will be a direct descendent.
